arts.ttl: Thorup calls for VAR after controversial opener helps Norwich beat Derby
arts.sum: A brilliant hat-trick from Borja Sainz clinched Norwich's 3-2 win at Derby but the main talking point of the Pride Park clash was a controversial opening goal for his team.

arts.ttl: Colin Kazim-Richards wades into Derby County controversy after Norwich defeat
arts.sum: Former Derby County striker Colin Kazim-Richards waded into the controversy that surrounded their defeat to Norwich City by insisting the Championship needs VAR technology. And former Rams striker Kazim-Richards took to X to say: "Need VAR in the Championship."

arts.ttl: Paul Warne responds to Derby County controversy after double Norwich City blow
arts.sum: Derby County head coach Paul Warne gave a diplomatic response to questions over the officials after two mistakes proved crucial in the 3-2 defeat to Norwich this afternoon. And the Norwich winger's third goal should have been a Derby corner i n another mistake not spotted by the officials.

arts.ttl: Paddy's Pointers: Four observations after Norwich's epic Derby win
arts.sum: Paddy Davitt delivers his pointers after the Canaries 3-2 Championship win at Derby.

arts.ttl: 'The Borja Sainz show' - City fans react to Derby win
arts.sum: Watch Norwich City fans react to the Canaries' 3-2 Championship win over Derby County.

arts.ttl: Leigh Curtis's Derby County player ratings v Norwich as duo shine amid Pride Park fury - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: It started with Yates flicking a pass into the feet of Osborn who found the run of Nathaniel Mendez-Laing whose cross to the back post was met by Kayden Jackson who scuffed wide of the post. Another mistake by Derby in possession was pounced on which ended up leading to Sergent crossing for Sainz although the ball had clearly run out of play.

arts.ttl: Borja Sainz hits fine hat-trick as Norwich get the better of Derby
arts.sum: His opener was a controversial one at Pride Park.

arts.ttl: 'Good grief!' | Boos ring out as controversial Norwich goal allowed to stand
arts.sum: Norwich take the lead in controversial circumstances as Josh Sargent pulls the ball back from the byline, but it looked like the ball had already gone out of play.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne chooses Callum Elder replacement as he names Derby County team to face Norwich
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Nyambe, Nelson, Cashin, Forsyth; Adams, Osborn, Goudmijn; Mendez-Laing, Yates, Jackson. Warne does have plenty of options on the bench too with Kane Wilson, Sonny Bradley, James Collins, Nat Phillips, Marcus Harness, Corey Blackett-Taylor, Tawanda Chirewa, Josh Vickers and Dajaune Brown being the substitutes.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Derby County v Norwich City
arts.sum: Follow live updates and join the debate as Norwich City travel to Pride Park to face Derby County in the Championship.
